creator: awilkinson@pivotal.io
text: https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=59923 reduced the default value for PoolProperties validationInterval from 30000 to 3000 but the javadoc of PoolConfiguration's getValidationInterval() and setValidationInterval() methods still states that the default is 30000.

creator: violetagg@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 60139 ***
